root.name: Dragon Ball Z: Shin Budokai - Another Road
root.description: OverviewDragon Ball Z: Shin Budokai - Another Road is a 3D fighting game and sequel to Dragon Ball Z: Shin Budokai. Gameplay is similar to the Dragon Ball Z: Budokai series with added fighting mechanics. The game includes an original story arc of Future Trunks.Characters Goku Gohan Teen Gohan Future Gohan Vegeta Future Trunks Gogeta Vegito Gotenks Piccolo Krillin Bardock Pikkon Frieza Cell Cooler Broly Majin Buu Super Buu Kid Buu Janemba Android 18 Dabura
